info.author: Uwe Schmitt
info.description:
Savitzky-Golay-Smoothers are linear filters which smooth data or compute a
smoothed derivative of given order and preserve peaks and other important
features of the underlying signal.
info.keywords: math, datamining, machine learning, signal processing
info.name: Savitzky-Golay-Filters
info.summary: Savitzky Golay Filters for smoothing functions
info.html_description: Savitzky-Golay-Smoothers are linear filters which smooth data or compute a smoothed derivative of given order and preserve peaks and other important features of the underlying signal.
